entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm.
